# Testing Appdome Build2Test-Secured iOS Apps with Tricentis

Last updated October 7, 2024 by Appdome

This Knowledge Base article provides instructions on how to test Appdome-Secured Android Apps using Tricentis Device Cloud Testing suite, a versatile testing platform for web and mobile applications. Appdome seamlessly integrates with top mobile testing solutions, enabling customers to enhance mobile app security within their existing application lifecycle with the speed and agility of DevSecOps.

**Use Appdome’s Build2Test service (Recommended)**  
Customers with an Appdome SRM license can use Appdome’s Build2Test service to quickly and easily test their Appdome-secured mobile apps using Tricentis Device Cloud without the need for different Fusion Sets. With Appdome’s Build2Test service, Appdome’s in-app defense model recognizes the unique signature of these testing services and allows for easy testing without issuing a security alert or forcing the app to exit, even if these services use tools such as Magisk or Frida.

For details, see [How to Use Appdome Mobile App Automation Testing](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/appsec-release-orchestration/testing-protected-mobile-apps/use-appdomes-build-to-test-service/).

## General Information About Testing in iOS Apps

Appdome protection features that may be triggered:

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Appdome feature** | **Description** | **Behavior with Build2Test** |
| Prevent Code Injection | Detects and blocks unauthorized code injections to safeguard the app’s integrity. | Alerts the app when potential code injection is detected but does not cause the app to crash, ensuring uninterrupted testing. |

## Upload the App to Tricentis Device Cloud

1. Login into your Tricentis Device Cloud account: [tdc.tricentis-cloud.com](https://tdc.tricentis-cloud.com/login)
2. Click on the **Remote Control** icon.
3. Choose a device and click ‘**Start**‘.  
   ![Click Start](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Click-Start-1-e1724238895560.png)
4. Navigate to the app icon and click on ‘**Apps**.’
5. Select one of your uploaded apps and click ‘**Install**.’ Alternatively, click ‘**Browse**‘ to upload your Appdome Build2Test app and then install it.
6. Initiate recording by clicking the start recording button and waiting for it to turn green.  
   ![Click Apps Start Recording](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Click-apps-start-recording-1.png)
7. Locate the app via the mobile device screen.
8. Open the app and start testing.  
   ![Locate App](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Locate-app.png)
9. Conclude testing by clicking the green recording button again to stop recording.  
   ![Stop Recording](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Stop-Recording-e1724235495575.png)
10. Access the **Performance Session** via the left-side menu and await the test results.  
    ![Performance Sessions](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Performance-Sessions-3.png)
11. Click on the **Waterfall UI** button.  
    ![Waterfall Ui Ios](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Waterfall-UI-iOS.png)
12. Choose your desired tests to export from the download drop-down menu, such as device logs.

    ![Download Results](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Download-Results.png)
